page.title: 16PASTIMES & LEISURE SPORTS
page.content: The main sporting activity in this area is horse-riding, although very few horses are stabled in the district. It is excellent country for long distance riding. Hang-gliding is practiced on a small scale from Liddington Hill, together with the flying of model aircraft and children's kites. If the snow fall is heavy in the winter then the skiers take to the slopes, often accompanied by youngsters on their toboggans. The most obvious leisure activity is walking. This is a wonderful area to walk with quite breath-taking views from the high points. Pheasant shooting is carried out in a small area on the downs (with pheasants specially bred for the sport).
